content.html:
there's a test in 79df31bf1c09 (branch collision_pose_test_7) that should work

can you merge that into this branch?

Sorry, I couldn't come up with a decent test for this. I wasn't sure if checking whether dtCollisionShape contains correct relativePose in it would be enough. Then I tried to test it using actual collision tests but had a problem in using ContactManager. It seemed the contact manager doesn't public contacts when there is no subscribers. (I'm still not sure). Here is the test code I tried. Just in case it helps:

/////////////////////////////////////////////////
void Issue1838Test::CollisionRelativePose(const std::string &_physicsEngine)
{
  Load("worlds/issue_1838.world", true, _physicsEngine);
  physics::WorldPtr world = physics::get_world("default");
  ASSERT_TRUE(world != NULL);
  world->SetGravity(ignition::math::Vector3d::Zero);
  EXPECT_EQ(world->Gravity(), ignition::math::Vector3d::Zero);

  // check the physics engine
  physics::PhysicsEnginePtr physics = world->GetPhysicsEngine();
  ASSERT_TRUE(physics != NULL);
  EXPECT_EQ(physics->GetType(), _physicsEngine);

  physics::ModelPtr model1 = world->GetModel("sphere1");
  ASSERT_TRUE(model1 != NULL);
  physics::LinkPtr link1 = model1->GetLink();
  ASSERT_TRUE(link1 != NULL);
  physics::CollisionPtr collision1 = link1->GetCollision("collision");
  ASSERT_TRUE(collision1 != NULL);

  ignition::math::Pose3d pose1 = collision1->GetRelativePose().Ign();
//  EXPECT_EQ(pose1, ignition::math::Pose3d(0.1, -0.5, 2.5, 0, 1.57, -1.57));

  physics::ContactManager* contactManager = physics->GetContactManager();
  ASSERT_TRUE(contactManager != NULL);

  // Verify we get a valid topic name after passing in collisions
  std::map<std::string, physics::CollisionPtr> collisionMap;
  collisionMap["collision"] = physics::CollisionPtr();
  std::string collisionMapName = "collision_map";
  std::string topic = contactManager->CreateFilter(collisionMapName, collisionMap);
  EXPECT_TRUE(topic.find(collisionMapName) != std::string::npos);
  EXPECT_TRUE(contactManager->HasFilter(collisionMapName));
  EXPECT_EQ(contactManager->GetFilterCount(), 1u);

  std::cout << contactManager->GetContactCount();
  physics->UpdatePhysics();
  physics->UpdateCollision();
  std::cout << contactManager->GetContactCount();

  link1->SetRelativePose(math::Pose(0, 0, 0.1, 0, 0, 0));

  std::cout << contactManager->GetContactCount();
  physics->UpdatePhysics();
  physics->UpdateCollision();
  std::cout << contactManager->GetContactCount();
}

/////////////////////////////////////////////////
TEST_P(Issue1838Test, CollisionRelativePose)
{
//  CollisionRelativePose(GetParam());
  CollisionRelativePose("dart");
}
